articles.content:

articles.title: Trump Finally Apologized For Something. No, Not That.

articles.content: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) The maker of a gun accessory tied to a racist shooting that killed 10 Black people at a supermarket in Buffalo will pay $1.75 million to survivors and victims families and stop sel… [+3008 chars]
